EmailTemplate.name: 202008_Amer_HCE_Foreflight-Honeywell-Forge_Support-Packages_email.202008_Email_H
EmailTemplate.subject: The Premier Experience: ForeFlight Dispatch with Honeywell Forge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
If you haven’t already heard, ForeFlight Dispatch, an innovative new flight planning solution, is available inside Honeywell Forge. This service integration supports our mission to bring the industry’s best to your Honeywell Forge dashboard. We are thrilled to provide this premier flight planning option.
What is ForeFlight Dispatch? ForeFlight Dispatch <[[https://foreflight.com/products/dispatch/?]]> is a powerful flight planning software that delivers reliable, easy and real-time flight planning for business jets. By incorporating ForeFlight Dispatch with Honeywell Forge, your flight department will benefit from greater control over your fleet operations with a singular solution for all their planning, tracking, datalink, and operational needs. Contact us to try ForeFlight Dispatch with Honeywell Forge free for 30-days. Please note this option needs to be enabled and isn’t integrated automatically.
New Support Packages – Available Now We are also excited to introduce new support packages that pair with our integrated flight planning options. Choose the specific support you want for your flight department. Pick the experience that best matches your operation, budget and mission profile. Our team is excited to start working with you. To view our support packages, click here <[[https://www.aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/connected-aircraft/business-aviation/flight-services]]>. These support packages work for future flight service integrations inside Honeywell Forge.
Want to Experience an In-house Dispatcher without the Cost? Also contact our team for a free 90-day trial of Honeywell Forge Dispatch Services. From preflight to parking, the Honeywell team of experienced dispatch specialists acts as an extension of your corporate flight department—24/7/365. They get to know you, your aircraft and your preferences in advance so we can jump right in when you’re ready to fly. Fill out the form below to sign up for your no-obligation free trial.
Need Help or Have Questions? Our team is here to help. Please contact your Honeywell sales representative or call: 1-888-634-3330 Ext 7 or email sales.honeywellforge@honeywell.com <[[mailto:sales.honeywellforge@honeywell.com]]>
GET STARTED <[[https://bga.honeywellforge.com/ff]]>
